1410940.name: Fantasy Grounds - Fantasy Grounds Art Pack 2019
1410940.description:
This product required Fantasy Grounds Unity
The 2019 Art Pack features art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools.
This pack includes the following items:
  • backgrounds (forests, grass, snow, stone, swamps, water)
  • brushes (rivers, roads, trails, shorelines, paths and tracks)
  • 132 decorations to add to maps, including themes for cemeteries, forests and swamps)
  • effects for fog, swamp scum and webs
  • full maps for forests, cemeteries, beaches, marsh and swamp hut
  • tiles for building dungeons (with LOS) or trails
Usage: You can find these assets under the Assets window under Images. The folder name is FG Art Pack 2019. This will be loaded automatically. You don't need to load a module.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software.
